DOC.brief_summary: This study involves two tasks. The first involves observation of patient care during simulated aeroevacuation missions in order to gauge task saturation. The second involves review of records from actual evacuation flights in order to determine the effects of task saturation on patient care.
DOC.brief_title: Enhanced Critical Care Air Transport Team Training for Mitigation of Task Saturation
DOC.criteria: Enrollment in a US Air Force CCATT Advanced Class at University Hospital, Cincinnati
